text: Futhi batshele indaba kaNowa ngenkathi ethi kubantu bakhe, â€œOh Bantu bami uma kunzima kunina ukuhlala kwami (lapha) nesikhumbuzo sami ngamavesi kaMvelinqangi ngakho-ke ngithembele kuMvelinqangi, cazululani udaba lwenu nabahlanganyeli benu, alunganihluphi udaba lwenu bese nehlulela mina bese ninganginiki ithuba
